Description: Twitter's new Twitter Blue service, which gives users access to exclusive features for a few bucks a month, is launching in Canada and Australia
Title: Twitter Blue subscriptions launch in Canada and Australia first
Author: httpsabout editors karissa bell

Description: Dozens have died as Canada sees a new record 49 6C (121 3F) for the third day in a row
Title: Trudeau pays respects to Canada heatwave victims
Author: httpsbbcnews

Description: Canada has changed its guidelines on mixing doses of Covid 19 vaccines, the country's health agency said Tuesday, and Canadians may get a different type of vaccine for their second shot
Title: Mixing vaccine brands is OK, Canada says
Author: Paula Newton, CNN

Description: Maps, graphics and charts explaining the Canada and north west US heatwave, with temperatures at nearly 50C
Title: Canada weather Visual guide to what's happening
Author: httpsbbcnews

Description: Canada found no evidence the tragedy was premeditated but called out Iran's recklessness
Title: Canadian report slams 'reckless' Iran for downing of flight PS752
Author: httpsbbcnews
